title: The.Black.Hole.1979.DVD.PAL.576p.DD-5.1.MPEG-2-Grym
description:
The.Black.Hole.1979.DVD.PAL.576p.DD-5.1.MPEG-2-Grym.mkv


A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.                  


Director..........:  Gary Nelson  

Writer............:  Gerry Day & Jeb Rosebrook (Screenplay)            

Starring..........:  Maximilian Schell, Anthony Perkins, Robert Forster   


iMDB URL..........:  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078869
SOURCE TYPE.......:  Retail DVD-5 3,5 GB Overall Bit Rate @ 5440 kbps 
ViDEO SPECS.......:  Mpeg-2 5053 Kbps - 25,000 fps
AUDiO SPECS.......:  English Dolby Digital 5.1 384 kbps 48 kHz 16 bit       
RUNTiME...........:  1h 31 min
MOViE CROPPED.....:  No
FiLM ASPECT RATiO.:  2.35:1 Anamorphic Scope / Letterbox 
RESOLUTiON........:  720 X 576p
EXTRAS............:  Sorry no Extras on Disc
SUBTiTLES.........:  English, Danish


NOTE: Great little Disney sci-fi with a strange and "ridigulous" :) ending, but
      'The Black Hole' offer, for its time, fine production and design value,
      as well as a cool story and cast.

      So enjoy this DVD release while we wait until we get a completely restored
      blu-ray release hopefully some time soon. Or even a remake with a much
      better ending. ;) 
       

                                         (-G-)
